title: Interpretation of killing a cockroach in a dream. The meaning of seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them

preview.html: In this article, we will explain in detail the interpretation of killing a cockroach in a dream. Cockroaches are disgusting and frightening insects because they cause panic in some people as soon as they see them. Therefore, it is one of the visions that they dream of, not doing it bodes well, and some believe that dreaming about it indicates the appearance of some evil in their lives. Here you are, my dear. Read the detailed interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them, as they are among the primary visions that cause anxiety and terror in souls, especially in the case of seeing flying cockroaches in a dream. We find some people looking for those interpretations that come in a dream of a flying cockroach and the interpretation of dreams of large cockroaches in a dream because it is considered a vision that causes panic, so what are these visions in reality? Encyclopedia, follow us. Interpretation of killing a cockroach in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars have stated that seeing a cockroach in general is one of the hateful visions that indicate enemies in the dreamer’s life who harbor malice and hatred towards him, especially in the case of seeing black cockroaches. In the case of killing a cockroach in a dream, this vision is a vision. Promising kindness and nourishment. Seeing yourself killing cockroaches in a dream also means that the debt will be repaid if the dreamer is in debt in reality. Among the symbols mentioned by dream interpretation scholars regarding this vision is that it expresses the dreamer’s desire to change his life for the better, and it is also a sign of overcoming On enemies, in addition, it symbolizes the dreamer's desire to repent to God and turn away. From doing prohibited things. If the dreamer sees a dead cockroach in a dream, then this vision expresses the obstacles that the dreamer faces in achieving his goals. If you see a cockroach attacking and the dreamer escapes from them in the dream, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is afflicted with magic, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in Dreaming and killing them. There are many interpretations when we see cockroaches in a dream, so we accompany you on a tour to decode this vision and the multiple interpretations it carries, as they are among the insects that appear in tropical regions. They appear repeatedly in the summer in the Arab regions and their types vary to reach 30 species, while their appearance in a dream It confuses the monarch and awakens him from his stagnation in search of the meanings, connotations, and symbols that his visions carry. . In fact, this is what we learn in our article. Seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them symbolizes the dreamer. His attempt to eliminate all negative habits arising in his personality. It affects him negatively and puts him in a place where he does not believe in interacting and behaving with others, so it is one of the praiseworthy visions that bode well, and God knows best. Seeing a cockroach and killing it in a dream indicates this; For God to enlighten his insight and keep him away from evil companions and give him happiness, satisfaction and stability in his relationship with those around him, and God knows the unseen. Seeing cockroaches in a dream means that he is surrounded by many evil enemies, so he must be careful and ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about flying cockroachesSeeing flying cockroaches In the dream it refers to me. The problems and problems that he actually faces and can be overcome, and God knows best. Seeing cockroaches

title: Interpretation of seeing a horse or horse in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a horse in a dream as an indication that the dreamer will occupy a high position and obtain a great status, and this may be a sign of earning a lot of money. Whoever dreams that he is riding a horse with a lamp, this dream indicates that The dreamer has bad morals and may be evidence that the dreamer marries boys without women. And to see drinking horse milk in a dream is evidence that you have obtained a lot of money from the Sultan. The dream of a bachelor who rides a horse indicates marriage to a woman of noble birth and may be a sign of occupying a high position And gaining status and power. Whoever sees horses gathering in the house in a state of sadness, this indicates the death of a relative, but if the community is in a state of joy, this indicates the parents gathering on a happy occasion. Seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a horse in a dream means that she You will get a lot of good after hardships and hardships. And we see a white horse inside the house, there is a lot of good that permeates them. And whoever sees in a dream that she is riding a horse and goes out with it, then this dream does not indicate good, but rather indicates that a bad event will happen to her. Seeing a horse in a dream for a woman Single Scientists interpreted that an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is riding a white horse, then this dream indicates the marriage of a relative and the goodness that prevails over her. But if he sees himself buying a horse in a dream, this may be a sign of recovering a lot of money from the person who bought it. The horse is from him. Seeing a sick horse in a dream is a sign of trouble. A horse in a pregnant woman’s dream. A pregnant woman who sees a horse approaching her in a dream indicates the approaching date of childbirth. If one sees a white horse in a dream, this indicates that the newborn is female. If one sees a white horse in a dream, this indicates that the newborn is female. If one sees The horse is black, which means that the baby is male. Interpretation of seeing riding a horse in a dream. Interpretation scholars interpreted dreams of seeing a horse riding a horse in a dream and being able to catch up with it. A single man who dreams that he is riding a strong horse, this indicates his closeness, and if he is married, this indicates pregnancy. His wife and childbirth are male, and God knows best. Whoever falls from a horse in his dream is evidence that his position and standing among people will decline. Interpretation of seeing a raging horse in a dream: Whoever sees a raging horse in a dream and cannot approach it, this indicates that the dreamer is characterized by recklessness, madness, and recklessness without thinking. He sees that he has a race horse and enters the race and jumps with it, indicating that he will enter into more victories in his life and fulfill his desire. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations about seeing a horse in a dream. For those who have a vision and want to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the website Shamloul.

title: Interpretation of ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Shedding light on a little interpretation of ants in a dream: abundance of sustenance and profit, there are some other interpretations that indicate bad conditions and changing stable conditions in which the dreamer will find himself, and this differs between an unmarried girl, a woman, a divorced woman, or a man, each of them has different interpretations.Interpretation Seeing ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. We will find different interpretations of ants in a dream through the website: Where the scholar Ibn Sirin said: Seeing many ants in a dream indicates righteous people. And if many ants come in a sick person’s dream, they will remain in his death, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if the ants come out In a dream with food, this indicates the dreamer’s poverty. If one sees in a dream that ants are coming out of his mouth and stomach, this means that his period is approaching. As ants generally indicate the abundance of sustenance or earning money through halal ways. Read also: Interpretation of dogs in a dream in detailInterpretation of a vision Ants in a dream in the bedIf a sexy man sees a dream of ants in his bed, this vision indicates that he will find a new job that is better than his old job. Interpretation of ants in a dream in the bed indicates abundant sustenance and earning money. The more ants in the bed, the greater the livelihood and profits. If a person sees in a dream that ants bite him during pregnancy, then this vision indicates the collapse of the worries and anxieties present in the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing red ants in a dream in bed. If red ants come in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer may be going through a psychological problem or a health crisis. Red ants in a dream indicate the destruction of emotional relationships or the emergence of financial crises for the dreamer. Interpretation of red ants in a dream in a married woman’s bed indicates pregnancy. Red ants in a man’s dream in his bed while he is married to a woman he loves, indicates the doubts that have entered into this relationship. And many arguments. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of ants in a dream: A single girl says that she is with bad friends. Ants in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate that her closest friends are setting a trap for her. As the scholar Ibn Sirin said about ants in an unmarried girl’s dream, Many refer to her wasting money. Red ants in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate a man who loves her and wants to be officially associated with her. If an unmarried girl dreams of many ants in her bed, this means that she will marry someone she loves. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of ants In a dream, when a married woman shows a lot of money. Black ants on the bed in a married woman’s dream indicate that she will soon become pregnant with a new baby, as the child will be a boy. Also, a large number of black ants in the bathroom in a married woman’s dream indicates poverty and a lot of debt on her, and she may incur some Material losses. Termites in a married woman’s bed in a dream indicate that she will soon become pregnant with a new baby who will be a female. Read also: Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream for a married woman by senior imams of interpretation. Interpretation of seeing ants in a drunk person’s dream. If a bitter person sees

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a crown on the head in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: A crown on the head in a dream is evidence of the marriage of an unmarried woman to a person of good reputation and character, and in a married woman’s dream, wearing a crown indicates happiness and stability with the husband. In some places, Imam Ibn Sirin believes that a man’s gift to his wife a crown in a dream indicates recovery from illness. And the imminent pregnancy, and in the dream of a prisoner there is great freedom and happiness. Interpretation of the crown in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says in the interpretation of the Sunnah that seeing a crown in a dream expresses various sciences that a person can understand and benefit from because they are mentioned in the Qur’an and that the person who dreams of the crown is closely related . To God. As for the woman who dreamed of placing her crown on her head, this indicates that her husband occupies a prominent position among everyone. Just as the pregnant woman who sees the crown in her dreams has this interpreter, this indicates that God will give birth to her a new child. Interpretation of a dream Ibn Sirin’s Crown: A woman who dreams that she is wearing a crown will get married soon. Wearing a crown in a dream generally indicates honor and elegance. Whoever sees himself wearing a crown on his head will be very popular. Losing a crown in a dream means separation. A crown full of soil is an indication of illness. Interpretation of a dream about a crown Single Woman: A woman, when she wears a dream, will be a sign of her marriage to a rich man. When she sees unmarried women wearing a crown themselves, this indicates the approach of the authors of the book. If an unmarried woman sees that she is losing the crown, this indicates separation from some people. When she sees that she is wearing A crown full of pearls and precious stones, you will obtain a lot of money and wealth. A white crown in a dream indicates her marriage to a generous and handsome man. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s crown: A married woman who sees in her dream that she is wearing a crown will marry her eldest son. A married woman has not given birth yet, and if She saw a golden crown, she will be given a male, while a silver crown is an indication of female birth. If you see a crown with a box of diamonds and precious stones, this will be a great source of survival. Interpretation of a dream about a crown for a pregnant womanIf you see a pregnant woman wearing a golden crown, she will have a male child, but the crown Silver and white means a baby girl. When seeing a crown filled with precious stones, childbirth will be possible and the fetus will be healthy. Interpretation of a dream about a crown for a man: A young man who sees this silver crown brings this sign of sustenance with money and children. A white crown in a person’s dream indicates his short marriage. If he sees that he is wearing a crown White and full of precious stones, this is an indication of a great marriage. When a person sees himself wearing a golden crown, he will suffer from evil. A crown in a man’s dream is a sign of strength, pride and dignity. Wearing a wedding crown in a dream A girl can see herself wearing a wedding crown in a dream, This indicates a close marriage and family stability, which is achieved by God’s will, and in a married woman’s dream it is good news about the approaching pregnancy. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the golden wedding crown in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of

title: How do I dream about what I want?

preview.html: The question here is: is this possible? Is it really possible to remember people and memories from the past or see certain images in a dream? To answer this question, follow the topic below from gptafser.com/.Dream ControlDreams have been a mystery to man since ancient times, because they contain a mixture of events, people, feelings and sounds, some of which stay in our minds for a while. With development, many questions related to In the world of dreams, scientists have been able to answer many of the mysteries and secrets of dreams. But the dominant question remains about how to control dreams and whether anyone can dream of what they want. Given what dreams are, they are events, images, and people. In fact, the subconscious mind deals with them. Then he translates them into scenes that a person sees during his sleep. This confirms to us that contacting the subconscious mind, or what is called in psychology the subconscious, is the only way to control dreams. This is done through specific steps that are repeated over a period of time until you reach positive results. You can communicate with Your subconscious mind through complete relaxation and deep breathing. Just as meditation works magic on the subconscious mind, you can also practice yoga or spend some time in the calendar. See also: Dreams that indicate magic. How do I dream about what I want? It is clear to us from the above that controlling dreams requires practice and training, Because you will not be able to control your dreams overnight. This takes a long time and here are the most important steps to help you see what you want in your dream: Meditation: You need to spend enough time meditating, it is said that you go to sleep. This is to clear your mind of events and situations that have been stuck with it Throughout the day. To ensure a peaceful, restful sleep and a vivid dream that is easy to interpret. Visualization: This is done by drawing a clear picture in your imagination of the place you want to see. Composing a complete scene in terms of people, conversations, emotions, and sounds. Continue imagining this scene for as long as possible before sleeping. Placing dream signs next to your sleeping place: Psychologists say that placing a physical object is related to what you would like to see next to you while sleeping. It is very helpful to recall this in your dreams. Here are some examples: If you want to see a specific person in a dream, you should think about him and the memories you have collected. Then put his picture next to your pillow before you fall asleep. If you cannot solve a difficult arithmetic problem, you can write it on a piece of paper. And put it next to you before To sleep, you may see some ways to solve it in the morning. If you want to design a unique painting, you need to imagine some ideas and draw them on a white sheet of paper. Then you fold the paper and put it under your pillow. Sleeping in the dark: Psychologists say that sleeping in a dark room extinguishes All lights. So that a person does not see a difference in the dark when he opens or closes his eyes. One of the things that enhances a person’s ability to control his dreams. How to program dreams. The ability to program and control dreams requires thoughtful steps and long-term practice so that you can summon your subconscious mind. Don’t think It's six

title: Interpretation of seeing a black man in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a black man in a dream indicates many different meanings and interpretations that fall between negative and positive, and this varies depending on the psychological and social situation of the person in real life, but the dream in general can express goodness and blessings in the next life. Seeing a black man in a dreamSeeing a black man in The dream is generally evidence of the great success that the dreamer achieves in his real life, apart from the fulfillment of desires and ambitions that raise his status among people and place him in a prestigious position. Seeing a black man in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the happy period that she will live soon and receive a series of good news Which greatly helps to improve her psychological state and mood and increase her enthusiasm. Black in the dream of an unmarried young man is a sign of the great success he has achieved in his professional life, apart from entering into an emotional relationship with a girl with good qualities and morals that will soon end in marriage. title: What is the interpretation of a bird cage in a dream?

preview.html: CageInterpretation of a dream about colorful birds in a cageInterpretation of a dream about birds for a single womanIf you see a cage in a dream, you will be the happy owner of great wealth and many beautiful and charming childrenIf you see only one bird, you will have a rich and desirable marriageIf there is no bird in the cage, this indicates the loss of a family member , either through death or through the decision to marry. If you see wild beasts trapped, it means that you will triumph over your enemies and Jinja. If you are with her in the cage, it means a bout of accidents during the trip. A cage in a dream is a prison, and it may refer to a child’s cradle, and a cage is a house. Whoever dreams that he puts his head in a cage while walking in the markets and then sells his house and witnesses testify against him, the cage shows the complexity of matters and the conflict between them, and the cage shows marriage. Seeing birds of all kinds indicates the soul’s desire for freedom, liberty, and getting rid of something, especially when you see a cage in A dream shows a person's personality and mood and always tries to feel cheerful, happy and energetic. Happiness is inside him. The life and life of others, and dreaming of a bird cage may indicate that it is a message from God Almighty and the need to draw closer to Him and return to Him, according to the interpretations and sayings of His Sharia interpretation of various dreams. Interpretation of seeing a bird cage in a dream Dreaming of a bird cage in a dream generally indicates a feeling of joy, love, and happiness, or it could be It indicates the achievement of future goals and hopes that one seeks and is characterized by ambition. If you see an empty birdcage, this indicates the death of a relative, friend, or family member of the dreamer. If only one bird is seen in the birdcage, this indicates that you will soon marry a wealthy person And high in rank. But if he sees an empty cage without birds in a dream, this indicates the loss of a family member, whether it is marriage or death. Whoever sees a bird cage in a dream, this means great wealth and a lot of money on his way to him, and his feeling of happiness and joy. Whoever sees one bird In a cage, this indicates the marriage of a rich relative. Seeing birds in a dream indicates good news and a feeling of joy and happiness. As for seeing the death of birds in a dream, it can mean despair, sadness, anxiety, and disappointment. A birdcage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a birdcage in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates new opportunities or the arrival of great wealth or a lot of money on the way to him. Seeing it may indicate a safe path for the dreamer, and if a bird sees eggs in a cage, this indicates a lot of money, kindness, and food. But if he sees wild animals in a bird cage, this means that many accidents will occur during the trip, but if he sees wild animals caged In the cage alone, this means his victory over his enemies and the removal of worry, sadness and sorrow. Whoever sees a bird falling on him from the sky, this is evidence of the return of the absent person. Interpretation of birds in a dream: Whoever dreams that he chased a bird, this indicates that the dreamer may find a prominent person among the people and in authority. He put her in a cage and one of them escaped from the cage.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man cursing religion in a dream

The curse of religion may indicate that you are following the path of misguidance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may indicate walking on the path of error, and God knows the unseen. When you see insulting religion unintentionally, this may lead to neglecting religion, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is insulting religion, this may be a sign. On apostasy from religion, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that my girlfriend insults me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my girlfriend insulting me in a dream could be a sign of respect and appreciation, and God knows best. While you see your girlfriend insulting you, it may indicate that it may lead to trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see yourself You curse, it may mean that you are in trouble, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband cursing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for cursing my ex in a dream, it could be a sign of a difficult period, and God knows the unseen. Seeing my ex-husband cursing at me could express psychological crises, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see a divorced woman The ex curses me, this can lead to things that are not good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as he may express the matter by breaking up and think that he broke up, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my sister cursed me in a dream. I dreamed that my sister cursed me in a dream. And God knows best. When a married man sees an insult in a dream, it could be a sign of humiliation and disgust for the single person, and God knows the unseen. And if the dreamer sees an insult, it may be a sign of humiliation, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, while a curse from a humble person to a holder of a position may indicate adversity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. However, seeing insults can be a sign of humiliation, and God knows the unseen. Scientists have indicated that a curse is insulting to a slanderer, and glory is given to the slanderer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event The humble dreamer saw an insult to a person of stature. This may be a sign of misfortune for the afflicted person, and God knows the unseen. Where if a single girl sees a crazy man chasing her, he can relieve her of her worries, God willing. When I see a crazy person following me in a dream, it could be a sign. To get rid of problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a frightened person in a dream. Whereas if the dreamer sees a frightened person in a dream, this may be evidence of fearing God and preserving his happiness, and God knows the unseen. When you see a frightened man comforting, it may lead to good things

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about long hair from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair in a dream: Long hair is a dream for every woman and girl, so they take care of it, as it is a crown and a symbol of beauty, but seeing it in a dream represents happiness and success in life in the face of many problems, and seeing long hair for a man expresses happiness or shows the worries that he carries in His head, and this is what we will answer in this article. Interpretation of a dream about long hair. Commentators said that long hair in a dream is evidence of getting rid of problems and troubles that the dreamer is going through, if it is smooth and long. Seeing curly hair in a dream is undesirable and expresses fatigue and tension. Which the dreamer lives in, especially if he sees that he cannot style it and handle it easily. A man who sees that his hair is very long is a good sign that means that he has the ability to achieve goals and obtain many facilities in the field of work that make him the best. Long, thick hair in a dream Undesirable, and Ibn Shaheen interpreted it as many obstacles and problems that the dreamer faces, whether in the field of work or in his family environment and family life, and he must be patient during this. This period. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in the dream interpretation of long hair that it is a sign of ambition and the desire to achieve goals and to put in a lot of time and effort until he achieves what he wants. To see long hair in a dream, but it does not befit a pioneer or he is not accustomed to it. It is undesirable and indicates anxiety and strife in addition to the loss of money. As for seeing long hair with black locks, it means a return. Among those who are absent. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees his hair long in a dream, his life will last forever, but if he sees that he has tied his hair to increase its length, it indicates an increase in money if he is rich, but if he is poor, it indicates an increase in poverty and debts. Seeing long hair in a dream is An increase in life and money, but if he is good-looking, it is also a sign of recovery from diseases, getting rid of worries and sorrows, and the luxury of life if he is seen as determined. . Easily.Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a single woman. Long hair in a dream for a single woman is a sign of vitality and brightness in life, in addition to the constant search to get rid of all the negative feelings she is experiencing, which is a good thing. Long hair for an unmarried woman indicates positive events, but if She saw that she is styling her hair or dyeing it, it is a vision that indicates that she is preparing for a husband soon. Cutting long hair in the dream of an unmarried woman expresses freedom from the adversities and crises that she is going through, in the event that she sees that her appearance has become better, and that the vision also expresses the loss of anxiety and distance from the path. . Satan. Hair loss for an unmarried woman means that she will find a job soon, which will result in many changes in the financial and social situation. As for seeing it falling out during sleep, it means staying away from the path of temptation. The interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman is seen by jurists in interpretation.

Long hair in a dream for a single woman is a sign of vitality and brightness in life, in addition to the constant search to get rid of all the negative feelings she is experiencing, which is a good thing. As for seeing it falling out during sleep, it means staying away from the path of temptation. The interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman is seen by jurists in interpretation.

title: Interpretation of a small mouse in a dream and a big mouse in a dream

preview.html: Seeing small and large mice for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or single man, either the white, black, or brown mouse chases me and attacks me. The mouse hunts and more according to Ibn Sirin. The little mouse in a dream is the prodigal son or a harmful friend. Whoever sees a small mouse approaching him, this is a warning against falling into error or disobedience. Seeing a small mouse in a dream indicates a person who always brings harm and trouble to himself, and tramples on everyone around him and harms them, despite the relationship of the insight, whether male or female, to a good person and enjoys everything. Beautiful qualities. He is a person who spoils situations and events and helps spread corruption in his society. Therefore, the vision in general indicates that its owner misinterprets and harms himself first, the people around him, and finally society. Interpretation of a small mouse in a dream: It indicates a weak enemy who is thinking of tricks to harm you. A person who sees a small mouse in his hand indicates that there are friends among these malicious enemies and that he appears in the form of a close friend. Taking anything from small mice in a dream means that you receive benefits from enemies, and seeing small mice eating things in a dream means that an evil enemy has entered your home and exploited your money. Seeing a small mouse entering the house in a dream This vision indicates the entry and exit of a hissing and powerful enemy and exploitation of this enemy. For your money. It indicates the appearance of a bitter enemy who is chasing you, and you will be friends. Seeing mice building their nest in a dream is evidence of the presence of an enemy among relatives, while seeing many mice playing and jumping in a dream indicates the presence of enemies among family members and the emergence of misunderstandings and conflict. Discussions within the family. Killing a small mouse in a dream: This vision indicates victory over the enemy and discovering that the friends you thought were loyal are enemies in their eyes and are far from them. Seeing a small mouse killed in the house indicates the cancellation of the plans one of your relatives prepared for you. Seeing rats biting you in a dream means that misfortune is coming to you. Seeing a fight with a mouse and defeating it shows that you are a capable and strong person. The psychological interpretation of seeing a small mouse in a dream. Seeing a small mouse in a dream is an indication of the fear and anxiety experienced in life. And the fear of unexpected problems. It also states the person’s self-esteem and his hatred for some aspects of his personality, and this vision expresses these feelings. The interpretation of a large or huge mouse in a dream is a symbol of an unjust ruler or tyrant, and sometimes it symbolizes an employer, and seeing it in a dream is not considered bad or good as it is. Just an honest vision translates purity of heart and purity of bed. Interpretation of a black or gray mouse in a dream: It is an evil enemy and an envious neighbor, and seeing it in a dream helps the sleeper not to fall into the traps of envy and magic sometimes. Interpretation of a white mouse in a dream: It is little money, a red mouse is the death of a friend, and a yellow mouse is an illness. Dangerous: If the sleeper sees a mouse in his dream eating his food, this indicates an increase in prices and the cost of living. Whoever feeds a mouse in his dream will receive food.
